newsitem.title: THAILAND: Bank of Thailand calls off 4 bln baht auction.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Thailand calls off 4 bln baht auction.

text.p: The Bank of Thailand (BOT) said on Thursday it called off Friday's four billion baht note auction because of tight liquidity in the Thai money market.

"In view of the tight liquidity in the money market, the Bank of Thailand has decided to call off the four billion BOT bond auction scheduled for tomorrow September 6, 1996," the BOT said in a statement.
Last month, the BOT called off a three billion baht bond auction for the same reason. ($1 = 25.3 baht)
